mapper.insert: INSERT INTO usr_info( usr_id, usr_nm, usr_lv, tel_num, mobile_num, usr_email, usr_cmpny, usr_gdr, usr_pwd, join_date, act_stus, zip_cd, norm_addr, dtl_addr, usr_brth) VALUES ( #(usr_id), #(usr_nm), #(usr_lv), #(tel_num), #(mobile_num), #(usr_email), #(usr_cmpny), #(usr_gdr), #(usr_pwd), #(join_date), #(act_stus), #(zip_cd), #(norm_addr), #(dtl_addr), #(usr_brth) )
